Meta.title: Cat with Million lives
Meta.author: Tomy
Meta.description: [h1]Overview[/h1] This mod introduces a new faith, [b]"Cat with Million lives"[/b]. This faith will protect you and your pets from death. [h1]Details[/h1] [h2]Favored Offerings[/h2] [list][*]Corpses [*]bonito flakes [*]sake barrel [*]churyu [/list] [h2]Faith Bonuses[/h2] [list][*]Speed [*]Magic [*]Stealth [*]Pickpocket [*]Anatomy [/list] [h2]Faith Ability[/h2] [list][*]Resurrection of the Soul [/list] [h3]Resurrection of the Soul[/h3] [list][*]Call an ally back from the world of the dead [/list] [spoiler] [h2]Faith Rewards[/h2] [olist][*]Nine lives the bake-neko (Pet) [*]Cat's Bell (Artifact) [/olist] [h3]Nine lives the bake-neko[/h3] [list][*]Possesses feats Celestical Cat, Fluffy Tail, Boost, and Levitation. [*]When grown by the feet of the Celestical Cat, tails increase, raising speed, mana, and fire resistance (up to a maximum of 7 tails). [*]Can use Fire Bolt, Fire Ball, Fire Sword, and Resurrection. [/list] [h3]Cat's Bell[/h3] [list][*]Faction Enchantments that defends you from death penalty. [/list] [/spoiler] [h2]Altars[/h2] By installing this mod, water altars will appear among the altars placed in fields and Nefias.
